tool_description: News about Covid 19 from different sources including WHO, guardian, CNN, etc
name: Covid news_v2
title: Covid news

api_list.name: Get news from single source
api_list.description: Get news related to Covid 19 news from a single source which are WHO, CNN, the guardian, etc
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news5.p.rapidapi.com/singleSource/bmj"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-news5.p.rapidapi.com/singleSource/{newsid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: News from All sources
api_list.description: Get news related to covid 19 from **All sources**
api_list.code:
